attributes.action: tell us why everything is such a fight for disabled / special needs children and their families ???
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am at the end of my teather with fighting for equipment and services for my severely disabled child.I speak every week with parents who are fighting the same battles. Why is there not enough government money to provide our children with things they need ?? Why is money from the tax payers going on unecessary things ?? Why do we have to suffer and more than we already do ??

rejection.details: Your petition does not request a specific course of action from the Prime Minister.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
